text: Pere Riba was the defending champion, however lost to Alessio di Mauro already in the first round. Aljaž Bedene, who received wildcard into the singles main draw, won this tournament. He defeated 3rd seed Filippo Volandri in the final. ==Seeds== ==Draw== ===Finals=== ===Top Half=== ===Bottom Half=== ==References== * Main Draw * Qualifying Draw Open Barletta Trofeo Dimiccoli and Boraccino - Singles 2011 Singles
title: 2011 Open Barletta Trofeo Dimiccoli & Boraccino – Singles
